title: [L2M] - Order Placement - Tariff Change and Modify
acceptance_criteria:
A Change Order can be placed towards MAPI POM for fulfillment. Following actions are performed as part of the order placement:
O3 obtains a temporary contact id for the relatedParties that are affected by the update coming from EOS and updates the partial order accordingly
O3 performs a mapping of the partialOrder to the MAPI POM structure
O3 calls the MAPI POM service to create a MAPI order
O3 updates the partialOrder based on the synchronous response from MAPI POM
O3 obtains a temporary contact id for the relatedParties that are affected by the update coming from EOS and updates the partial order accordingly
O3 performs a mapping of the partialOrder to the MAPI POM structure
O3 calls the MAPI POM service to create a MAPI order
O3 updates the partialOrder based on the synchronous response from MAPI POM

O3 reacts on events coming from MAPI POM while the order is in stage of fulfillment, which includes:
Receiving ProductOrderStateChangeEvents from MAPI PO
Calling MAPI POM to obtain the latest version of the order and update the partialOrder (in O3) accordingly
Sending ProductOrderStateChangeEvents to EOS
Calling MAPI POM to obtain the latest version of the order and update the partialOrder (in O3) accordingly
